summary: The film chronicles filmmaker Joel DeMott, significant other/film partner Jeff Kreines and filmmaker Mark Rance as they head to Michigan to make a low budget horror film.
cast: Joel DeMott|Jeff Kreines|Mark Rance|Donald G. Jackson|Jerry Younkins|Ray Poll|Carol Lasowski|Mrs. Luye Jackson|Bill Baetz|Ted Nugent|Kyra Nash
title: Demon Lover Diary
